Text: Cc Dear Mark Im helping Barbara Gray with the finalization of the GISB with El Paso Merchant Energy LP Barbara has approved El Pasos requested changes Exhibit B and she will initial the document when it is in final form Please send me the info on Enron Compression Services that Ill need to fill in the front left side of the GISB I dont have their document in electronic form but I hope that you do Many thanks Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron CorpLegal Phone Fax

AlertDEAR RECEIVER You have just received a Taliban virus Since we are not so technologically advanced in Afghanistan this is a MANUAL virus Please delete all the files on your hard disk yourself and send this mail to everyone you know Thank you very much for helping me Abdulla Talibanian hacker

OEC Mexico companies Cc Dear Randy Please tell me who in your group may have the working files for these companies so we can ask them to update the list of officers and to advise Corp Sec which attorney andor paralegal will be responsible for these entities Many thanks Mary O x Original Message From Pardue Larry Sent Thursday October AM To Ogden Mary Subject See belowreferenced companies Re OEC Mexico Operations LLC OEC Mexico S de RL de CV OEC Services S de RL de CV Wyndi McNamara of EEOS informed me that the above companies are now with EWSENA Would you confirm this and are you the designated keeper of these entities If so Ill update the database and our records Also if they are with ENA please confirm specifically which group within ENA ie EWSENA or EWSMexico Also if you know the designated lawyer in your group for these companies Ill take that info too All of course if you know Thanks Mary Larry Pardue Supervisor Corporate Services and Assistant Secretary Enron Corp Smith Street Suite Houston TX Tel Fax email

FW West Virginia title received Cc Gerald This almost looks like a joke but then I remembered working with Shonnie on buying a truck for the Denver office recently so you never know Since youre the Asset group now I thought Id run it by you MCO Original Message From Heinitz Mary J Sent Friday October PM To Braddy Martha Bruck Sarah Carnahan Kathleen Flores Nony Goode Diane Guinn Linda R Hearn III Ed B Korkmas Deb Mayer Laurie McNamara Wyndel Ogden Mary Perlingiere Debra Santos Claudia Young Kay Cc Lowry Donna Sublet Cheri Subject West Virginia title received Okay all I am sure there is a very good deal behind this but do any of you know where the recently received state of West Virginia title to a used trailer belongs The year of the trailer is the make of the trailer is NORS and the serial number is NTN The title was issued by WV on to Enron North America Corp no lienholder well thats a good fact Please ask around your groups regarding who is interested in holding on to this title Unless otherwise notified I am going to have it sent to the vault Please call me if you know to whom it should be directed Mary Heinitz Senior Legal Specialist phone fax

Lopez Velarde Heftye Abogodos SC Invoice vendor Cc Ladies and Gentlemen The subject invoice was sent to Accts Payable at En ron on Oct I received a call on Oct from somebody in Accts Payab le asking for clarification re the payee which I provided Since then the invoice has not appeared in ipayit I called the help desk today at x and the woman I spoke with said that since there was nothing in the syst em with the invoice number in it there was no way to check the status of my payment request I was told that the only way to ensure payment was to s end it to AP again The woman I spoke with suggested I prepare an emergen cy payment request if that was necessary I will now do this since I hav e no faith in the system as youve set it up Is there a way you could crossreference these items or find a way to keep these bills from getting lost Its very frustrating to have to keep rese nding invoices for payment when there seems to be no accountability for ite ms that disappear into the system I Another problem that I encountered with ipayit with another invoice for thi s vendor occurred just last month What happened was that even though Id marked the invoice for special handling when I coded it in ipayit it was n ot sent to me but instead went out in the US mail from New York I was u pset to learn that there seemed to be no way of finding out if the check w hich was addressed to an incomplete address in Mexico City Mexico even ha d enough postage on it for a foreign address or whether it had been returne d to sender They couldnt even tell me what the return address was that w ould have appeared on the envelope so I could see if the check had been ret urned before Enron cancelled it and asked for it to be reissued What was even more interesting to me was that the person at the help desk didnt ev en seem to care what the address was or whether or not there was a system i n place to retrieve returned checks so that the client could make sure they were properly forwarded to the payee What frustrates me is the total lack of accountability with your current se tup There is no way to followup on requests The burden is solely on t he bill sender with people on the paying end simply stating that we should run it through again with no guarantee that the invoice will be processe d a second time either In my case if Id known how important it was and that the burden of proof would be on me to get my invoice processed Id h ave written down the name of the person I spoke with in AP though Im not sure that they even gave it to me nor that it would help me to know that n ow in any case that called me on Oct Since I did not I have no reco urse since the system doesnt show my invoice as having been received Im certain that it is Enrons policy to pay bills on time Why do you set up systems that make our job so difficult and force us to followup on so many routine requests Id prefer to not have to do an urgent payment requ est for all the bills that Im responsible for paying but it seems thats the only way to make sure many invoices are paid Please let me know what solutions we can expect for problems such as this Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Phone Fax

Routine Q re Mexican LLCs Cc Dear Carlos Please consider the following questions Re the automotive gas sales LLC in Mexico do you know if the Mexico group still plans to form an SRL for that purpose If not perhaps we can delete or cancel the Delaware LLC that was set up to coown it the SRL with a Dutch BV This LLC is one Kate Cole was asking about recently because I never did finalize the LLC agreement since the need for this LLCs existence was called into question right after we formed it Re the Baja LLC and SRL set up for the FAPSA deal How is that deal progressing Will the companies be used If so I need to change the officers and directors and I need your advice on which people in the company would be best in those capacities How about all the Desarrolladoras de Predios SRLs set up to do real estate deals Where is the group headed with that Do we want to continue to maintain these companies Please advise and thanks Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Phone Fax

Crawfish Plant Filing Cc Dear Patrick Yesterday I spoke with the Office of Conservation at the Louisiana Dept of Natural Resources about the Crawfish Plant As you may recall from our phone conversation several weeks ago we LRCI Inc have been assessed with a civil penalty for failure to file an R report in July La faxed me a copy of the June report and it shows a balance of barrels of oil at the plant We cant close out the filings with the state until the R report shows a balance of zero barrels Ive spoken with Annette Thompson in accounting the specialist who signed the June R report and she said shes in the process of determining exactly how to report the disposition of those last barrels of oil In the meantime Ive prepared a payment request form to go through the ipayit system for a check in the amount of the civil penalty This can accompany our final filing when its ready When the check comes back for coding should I sent it along to you for approval under your work order WBS element number Please tell me what that is so I can input the information Many thanks Ill call you when the check and final R form from Annette Thompson and the change of filing status form for the Crawfish Plant are ready Best wishes Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Phone Fax

RE Review of Limited Liability Company records Cc Dear Kate Re Automotive Industrial Energy Company LLC I am responsible for this entity but it doesnt fall under Alans bailiwick It is instead in Carlos Sol and Jeff Hodges area EWS Legal Anyhow this LLC was formed to coown an SRL in Mexico that was not created because the deal in quesitonto provide energy to automobile producers in Mexicowas put on hold I told somebody in your office about my desire to hold off on the LLC agreement because of this situation and was told it was OK to do so for a little while Well try to ascertain the current needs of the business group to see if this LLC should be maintained or dissolved and Ill keep you advised Best wishes Mary EWS Legal x

RE Fred Lagrasta Cc Yes ENA Upstream Company LLC is the entity that deals with ENAs transactions with producers similar to the way HPL Houston Pipe Line Company was dealing with producers As for Fred Lagrasta Ive already created a document copy attached asking for Lagrasta to be named a VP I dont know where it is in the signing cues of the relevant officers but it may need to be changed since the directors have changed since I created the doc Have you by any chance seen this signed document I sent it to the rd floor to be signed and I havent had it returned Please advise and thanks Best wishes Mary x EWS Legal

Live Link Access Cc Dear Moyez Please arrange for the following three legal specialists in EWS Legal to have access to Live Link Mary Ogden x mogden Laurie Mayer x lmayer Nony Flores x nflores Thank you for your assistance with this matter and please call me with questions Sincerely Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Phone Fax

Enron Midstream Services LLC Cc Jessica As you requested this afternoon I faxed to you a certificate signed by the Assistant Secretary of Enron North America Corp indicating that ENA was the sole member of Enron Midstream Services LLC I hope this document satisfied your request Please advise if youd like the original sent to you via intracompany mail or if you need additional information or documentation Best wishes Mary

HPL Regulatory filings Cc Tom Regarding regulatory filings for HPL I routinely send a P report with a cover letter from Gerald Nemec and a form signed by Barbara Gray as Vice President General Counsel Assets and Secretary of HPL to the Texas Railroad Commission during April of every year The P report for HPL is due by May Best wishes Mary

Re HPL Regulatory filings Cc exact information regarding the Houston Pipe Line Company P report already appears on page in your document entitled Texas Gas Utility Regulatory Filings Best wishes Mary Tom Shelton AM To Mary CT cc Subject Re HPL Regulatory filings Just in case you dont have the spreadsheet form here it is Forwarded by Tom SheltonHOUECT on AM Enron North America Corp From Tom Shelton AM To Mary CT cc Subject Re HPL Regulatory filings Mary could you please fill in the attached form with the requested information Can you provide some more info about the form signed by Barbara Gray Thanks Mary Ogden AM To Tom CT cc Barbara N CT Gerald CT Subject HPL Regulatory filings Dear Tom Regarding regulatory filings for HPL I routinely send a P report with a cover letter from Gerald Nemec and a form signed by Barbara Gray as Vice President General Counsel Assets and Secretary of HPL to the Texas Railroad Commission during April of every year The P report for HPL is due by May Best wishes Mary

Enron Midstream Services LLC POA Cc Jessica and Chuck I want to let you know that Kate Cole Asst Sec of the subject entity has signed the consent of sole member that gives Charles W Falkenstein Jr authority to execute real property agreements for and in the name and on behalf of the LLC The consent is dated October and has been entered into the corporate notebook A copy of this resolution will be placed in our EMS file and Ill send you each a copy in Denver Best wishes Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron North America CorpLegal

Confidentiality Agreements Cc Chris At the request of Gerald Nemec Im attaching confidentiality agreements for your review for the following parties Energen Resources Corporation Lewis Energy Group Please call me or Gerald x with questions or comments Best wishes Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Smith Street EB d Houston TX Phone Fax

Status of HPL wells at Bammel Cc David Im assisting Gerald Nemec in HPLs Tx Railroad Commission TxRRC P filing The TxRRCs files indicate that we have inactive wells at Bammel Field No The two wells are Pyles Anna Unit LeaseID well Ehrhardt John LeaseID wells If these wells are inactive but not plugged we will need to obtain bonds for these wells Also new TxRRC rules state that we must perform an H test on these wells now Please tell me the status of these wells If they are plugged and abandoned our compliance requirements may change If not can you help us make sure that an H test is performed and send me such proof so that I can satisfy the TxRRC requirements Thanks in advance for your help and please call me with questions or comments Best wishes Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Smith Street EB d Houston TX Phone Fax

Re Status of HPL wells at Bammel Cc Steve Yes Im going by the documentation sent to us by the Railroad Commission Ill keep you advised re final disposition of the P filing Best wishes Mary Steve HPL Schneider AM To Mary CT cc Subject Re Status of HPL wells at Bammel On the Ehrhardt did you mean to reflect wells Mary Ogden AM To David NRON cc Gerald CT Cheryl CT Steve HPL CT Subject Status of HPL wells at Bammel Dear David Im assisting Gerald Nemec in HPLs Tx Railroad Commission TxRRC P filing The TxRRCs files indicate that we have inactive wells at Bammel Field No The two wells are Pyles Anna Unit LeaseID well Ehrhardt John LeaseID wells If these wells are inactive but not plugged we will need to obtain bonds for these wells Also new TxRRC rules state that we must perform an H test on these wells now Please tell me the status of these wells If they are plugged and abandoned our compliance requirements may change If not can you help us make sure that an H test is performed and send me such proof so that I can satisfy the TxRRC requirements Thanks in advance for your help and please call me with questions or comments Best wishes Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Smith Street EB d Houston TX Phone Fax

Intratex Cc Julie Were you able to find out by Intratex is not in good standing franchise taxwise Im not sure about where to go from here since I have my report complete and check ready to send to the Tx Railroad Commission Please let me know what you found out Thanks Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Smith Street EB d Houston TX Phone Fax

FW West Virginia title received Cc Gerald This almost looks like a joke but then I remembered working with Shonnie on buying a truck for the Denver office recently so you never know Since youre the Asset group now I thought Id run it by you MCO Original Message From Heinitz Mary J Sent Friday October PM To Braddy Martha Bruck Sarah Carnahan Kathleen Flores Nony Goode Diane Guinn Linda R Hearn III Ed B Korkmas Deb Mayer Laurie McNamara Wyndel Ogden Mary Perlingiere Debra Santos Claudia Young Kay Cc Lowry Donna Sublet Cheri Subject West Virginia title received Okay all I am sure there is a very good deal behind this but do any of you know where the recently received state of West Virginia title to a used trailer belongs The year of the trailer is the make of the trailer is NORS and the serial number is NTN The title was issued by WV on to Enron North America Corp no lienholder well thats a good fact Please ask around your groups regarding who is interested in holding on to this title Unless otherwise notified I am going to have it sent to the vault Please call me if you know to whom it should be directed Mary Heinitz Senior Legal Specialist phone fax

LRCI Inc problemDear Gerald Ive received a notice re LRCI Inc Crawfish plant Were delinquent on our Form R and a penalty has been levied I think this is the sort of regulatory matter that used to be handled by Juanita Marchant who has moved to AEP Do you know who is in charge of handling these kinds of filings Thanks Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Phone Fax

FW Assumption Parish recordsNonPrivilegedpst FYI Mary Original Message From Ogden Mary Sent Friday July AM To Cc Van Hooser Steve Subject Assumption Parish records Dear Keith Thank you for calling yesterday to ascertain the deadline for information on Assumption Parish records re Enron Storage Company and their conveyance of certain land assets to LRCI Inc If you are able to send somebody to Assumption Parish by the middle of next week to check the records that will be fine We want the process to be cost effective but please have some information to us by the end of next week Thank you Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Smith Street EB d Houston TX Phone Fax

Napoleonville land Cc NonPrivilegedpst Dear Patrick We are trying to obtain copies of the document whereby Enron Storage Company conveyed the Napoleonville land assets to LRCI Inc They were probably part of the Bridgeline closing documents Do you have any documents that support this conveyance Please advise Thanks Mary x

Closing document re Napoleonville land conveyance Cc NonPrivilegedpst Dear Robert Do you recall what you did with the documents relating to Bridgeline whereby the Napoleonville land was kept out of the transaction by being deeded over to LRCI Inc Patrick Johnson recalls you were involved with those documents and were trying to find them Ann Elizabeth White said that she believes the files are here in Legal but we cant locate them Patrick Johnsons recollection that you might have filed the conveyance documents is what leads me to ask you if you have them or know where they are Thanks for letting me pick your brain on yet again another document search Best wishes Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax

FW Closing document re Napoleonville land conveyance Cc NonPrivilegedpst Steve Yes I did receive a response from Robert Rose about the Napoleonville conveyance Ann Elizabeth has said she gave the file to you so were still in a position to do a complete search Mary Original Message From ENRON mailtoIMCEANOTESrrroseaepEcom NRONcom Sent Thursday August PM To Ogden Mary Subject Re Closing document re Napoleonville land conveyance Hi Mary I dont have a clue who filed the original documents I know for a fact that ROW did not do the filing for this transaction It seems to me it would have been someone on EB who did the filing Back a couple of months ago there were copies of some of the agreements in a meeting AE Patrick Johnson and I had I think AE brought her copies to the meeting So it would stand to reason that these copies should exist in AEs Enron files left on EB I dont think I ever saw the originals though r To cc Nemec Gerald Van Hooser Steve Subject Closing document re Napoleonville land conveyance Dear Robert Do you recall what you did with the documents relating to Bridgeline whereby the Napoleonville land was kept out of the transaction by being deeded over to LRCI Inc Patrick Johnson recalls you were involved with those documents and were trying to find them Ann Elizabeth White said that she believes the files are here in Legal but we cant locate them Patrick Johnsons recollection that you might have filed the conveyance documents is what leads me to ask you if you have them or know where they are Thanks for letting me pick your brain on yet again another document search Best wishes Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron North America Corp Phone Fax This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you

CA for Encore Acquisition Partners Cc NonPrivilegedpst To Nathan Creech At the request of Gerald Nemec Im forwarding to you our draft confidentiality agreement for Encore Acquisition Partners Please review and also tell us their complete legal name before we finalize this document Thank you Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Phone Fax

Revised CA with Encore Cc NonPrivilegedpst Dear Nathan Here is the revised CA with Encore Acquisition Company Please advise if further revisions are desired Best wishes Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Phone Fax

Exclusivity WordingNonPrivilegedpst Gerald Lisa Druzbik has asked me for some generic exclusivity wording I pulled the following paragraph from one of Steves documents Is it OK to send this to her Please advise Thanks Mary O Exclusivity In consideration of the efforts to be expended by Seller in p roviding information with respect to the Assets and the exclusivity rights granted below Buyer agrees to pay Seller Dollars as an earnest payment Earnest Payment within days of the e xecution of this Agreement In consideration of the efforts to be expended by Buyer in undertaking its due diligence review of the Project and Assets Seller hereby grants to Buyer during the Term of this Agreement the Ex clusivity Period the exclusive right to pursue the Project with Seller During the Exclusivity Period Seller shall not work with any other persons with regard to the Project or pursue any other transaction involving the As sets The Earnest Payment shall be credited against the agreed upon purchas e price for the Assets set forth in the Definitive Agreements If the Pa rties do not complete a sale of the Assets Seller shall retain the Earnest Payment without further obligation to Buyer

Exclusivity Wording Cc NonPrivilegedpst Dear Lisa As you requested what follows is an example of exclusivity wording that you might use in a contract Please note however that all contracts must be approved and initialled by Gerald Nemec or another attorney in EWS Legal before they are signed by an EWS officer Mary O Exclusivity In consideration of the efforts to be expended by Buyer in undertaking its due diligence review of the Project and Assets Seller hereby grants to Buyer during the Term of this Agreement the Exclusivity Period the exclusive right to pursue the Project with Seller During the Exclusivity Period Seller shall not work with any other persons with regard to the Project or pursue any other transaction involving the Assets

FW LRCI IncFYI Original Message From Callahan Teresa Sent Monday November PM To Pinder Lori Cc Ogden Mary Heinitz Mary J Subject LRCI Inc Importance High Lori Mary Ogden called today looking for the documentation supporting the appointment of Louise Kitchen as a director I went through minute book documents to be scanned documents scanned and to be filed and also what was in your office and sent to Mary Heinitz I also spoke to Peggyand she indicated that she was not working on this Please let me know if there is somewhere else I should have looked or called to locate documents perhaps Angela Davis or Travis Also she needed to adopted some resolutions by the Board of Directors I advised her that we still did not have a replacement for Frevert and that currently the Board only has two members that if she provided me with another member I would be happy to prepare Consent appointing to fill vacancy created by Freverts removalresignation Teresa Teresa A Callahan SupervisorCorporate Services and Assistant Secretary Enron Corp EB Phone Fax

FW LRCI Inc Directors electionGerald I meant to ask you if the slate we designated for LRCI Inc would alos work for the other LRC related entities Do you think they will Please advise and Ill tell Mary Heintiz Or naturally you can discuss this matter with her directly as well Mary O Original Message From Heinitz Mary J Sent Tuesday November PM To Ogden Mary Subject RE LRCI Inc Directors election Thanks and I listened to your voice mail about circulating my document as well Have you had a chance to ask Gerald about whether this slate of directors will work for the other LRC related entities Original Message From Ogden Mary Sent Tuesday November AM To Heinitz Mary J Subject FW LRCI Inc Directors election Importance High Mary As promised heres the document that is being circulated regarding the new directors of LRCI Inc Best wishes Mary O Original Message From Callahan Teresa Sent Monday November PM To Ogden Mary Cc Pinder Lori Subject LRCI Inc Directors election Importance High File Election of DirectorsLRCI Incdoc Mary Please let me know if you want any changes made to the attached If not please have an attorney initial and have Mr Redmond sign and I will sign I will be here for a while so I am available to sign Teresa Teresa A Callahan SupervisorCorporate Services and Assistant Secretary Enron Corp EB Phone Fax

Crawfish Plant Filing Cc Dear Patrick Yesterday I spoke with the Office of Conservation at the Louisiana Dept of Natural Resources about the Crawfish Plant As you may recall from our phone conversation several weeks ago we LRCI Inc have been assessed with a civil penalty for failure to file an R report in July La faxed me a copy of the June report and it shows a balance of barrels of oil at the plant We cant close out the filings with the state until the R report shows a balance of zero barrels Ive spoken with Annette Thompson in accounting the specialist who signed the June R report and she said shes in the process of determining exactly how to report the disposition of those last barrels of oil In the meantime Ive prepared a payment request form to go through the ipayit system for a check in the amount of the civil penalty This can accompany our final filing when its ready When the check comes back for coding should I sent it along to you for approval under your work order WBS element number Please tell me what that is so I can input the information Many thanks Ill call you when the check and final R form from Annette Thompson and the change of filing status form for the Crawfish Plant are ready Best wishes Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Phone Fax

Enron Field Services CorpDear Gerald I received and Oil Gas Proration schedule from the Texas Railroad Commission re the subject company showing a lot of monthly deliveries Do you know who in an Operations group should receive these reports Thanks Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Phone Fax

RE Fred Lagrasta Cc Yes ENA Upstream Company LLC is the entity that deals with ENAs transactions with producers similar to the way HPL Houston Pipe Line Company was dealing with producers As for Fred Lagrasta Ive already created a document copy attached asking for Lagrasta to be named a VP I dont know where it is in the signing cues of the relevant officers but it may need to be changed since the directors have changed since I created the doc Have you by any chance seen this signed document I sent it to the rd floor to be signed and I havent had it returned Please advise and thanks Best wishes Mary x EWS Legal

New Directors for LRCI Inc Cc Dear Teresa Thank you for offering to help me with the preparation of the resolution for EGS New Ventures Corp which owns LRCI Inc to appoint the following three individuals as directors of LRCI Inc effective today November Mark E Haedicke Brian L Redmond Jean M Mrha As you know the directors of EGS New Ventures Corp are James V Derrick Jr and Mark E Haedicke Thank you so much for your help Please call me if I can help get these documents signed today Best wishes Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Phone Fax

RE TPAs Cc Dear Shane Once you give me the fullyexecuted TPA I make a file copy for our office and send the original to the Global Contracts group along with a distribution worksheet that I fill out My contact at the Global Contracts group is Linda Bryan in EB a I understand that EES contracts are handled by Colette Weinreich at ext Best wishes Mary

RE Schedules to Bridgeline Contribution Agreement Cc Karen We have the schedules and theyre several inches thick Do you want to come by and review them to see which ones youd like to have or do you simply want all of them Please advise and thanks Mary x

Request for info re Encinal and Cerrito Cc Dear Carolyn Would you please be so kind as to see what information we have in our files regarding Enron Gas Processing and HPL each of whom owned a plant and gathering system respectively which were sold to Encinal and Cerritos Do we have a copy of the Purchase and Sale Agreement dated Im looking for this on behalf of Ann Elizabeth White who went to AEP with HPL Please advise and thanks Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Phone Fax

CAs with PGS NUI and JEA Cc NonPrivilegedpst Dear Jared Please review the attached drafts of your requested confidentiality agreements with Peoples Gas System NUI Corporation and Jacksonville Electric Authority Please advise me or Gerald Nemec about recommended changes Note to Ned Crady Since these CAs involve Enron Global Markets LLC as well as ENA we would appreciate your review and approval of these documents as well Thank you Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron Wholesale ServicesEnron AmericasLegal Phone Fax

Enron Gas Processing Company Cc NonPrivilegedpst Dear Steve The Texas Railroad Commission doesnt have anything in its records that certain assets held by the subject company were divested to KN Processing Inc a subsidiary of KN Energy Inc on Weve tried to tell the Texas Railroad Commission that we no longer own this company but since KN hasnt filed the proper reports for a number of wells for which it is shown to be a gas nominator andor gas gatherer the Commission is still looking to us to file reports like the P for this entity Do you remember who handled the sale of this company to KN Processing Inc I dont know where to begin to do the research about this company or these wells Please advise and thanks Mary x

Enron Industrial Natural Gas Company Cc NonPrivilegedpst To Ms Cheryl Dudley Houston Pipe Line Company Dear Cheryl Im sending you this information to followup regarding our brief discussion today about the subject company As I mentioned the Texas Railroad Commission still shows this company as active We have written to the TxRRC before saying that all the facilites and contracts for Enron Industrial Natural Gas Company were sold to HPL but they cant deactivate the company yet because their records show it as active due to the acitvity shown by another company Apparently the company that needs to file corrected Ps showing that HPL or another company is involved in these leases is Devon SFS Operating Inc N Broadway Suite Oklahoma City OK Phone The wells operated by Devon that show up in the TxRRC records are Gas ID Well State Lease Gas ID Well L State Lease Gas ID Well U State Lease I hope this information is helpful Thanks for helping us resolve this issue with the Texas RRC Best wishes Mary Mary C Ogden Legal Specialist Enron North America CorpLegal Mary

RE Draft email regarding Napoleonville Land Sale Cc NonPrivilegedpst Dear Eva Gerald Nemec Senior Counsel ENA suggests the following edits Gary Per our conversation on July I would like to reiterate that an Enron entity is interested in selling approximately acres of land at the Napoleonville salt dome in Louisiana This land is divided into two tracts one of about acres and the other about acres in size Enron recently received per acre in a separate land transaction at Napoleonville and this sets the market price that we expect to receive in the above proposed land sale Does Dow have interest in this land Is this price within your range If so I would encourage you to draft a proposal from Dow within the next two weeks if possible This email does not constitute an offer but is solely provided for informational purposes Lets discuss this at your earliest convenience Thanks again for taking the time to meet with me last Thursday and I look forward to hearing from you soon Sincerely Eva Rainer Upstream Products Group Enron Americas Original Message From Rainer Eva Sent Thursday July PM To Ogden Mary Subject Draft email regarding Napoleonville Land Sale Mary Below is a draft of the language for the email to Gary Chapman of Dow Chemical who wanted me to document our request informally so as to start the bidding process within Dow If you have revisions just forward them to me and I will paste them into a clean email to send to him Please let me know what you think Gary Per our conversation on July I would like to reiterate that Enron is interested in selling approximately acres of land at the Napoleonville salt dome in Louisiana This land is divided into two tracts one of about acres and the other about acres in size Enron recently received per acre in a separate land transaction at Napoleonville and this sets the market price that we expect to receive in the above proposed land sale Does Dow have interest in this land Is this price within your range If so I would encourage you to draft a proposal from Dow within the next two weeks if possible Lets discuss this at your earliest convenience Thanks again for taking the time to meet with me last Thursday and I look forward to hearing from you soon Sincerely Eva Rainer Upstream Products Group Enron Americas
